greeting: Ah, {empire_name}. You see what I allow you to see. Perhaps we can discuss matters of mutual... interest.
The Veiled One acknowledges your presence, {empire_name}. My true intentions remain hidden, as always.
You have found me, {empire_name}. Or rather, I have chosen to reveal myself to you. For now.
battleTaunt: You believe you know my forces, {empire_name}? You see only shadows. The reality will destroy you.
My true fleet emerges from the void. Everything you thought you knew was a carefully crafted illusion.
Strike at shadows, {empire_name}. My real attack comes from where you least expect.
victoryGloat: You never saw the true threat, {empire_name}. Victory was assured from the moment you revealed yourself.
Another pawn removed from the board. You served your purpose in my greater design.
The shadows claim another victim. Your defeat was written long before this battle began.
defeat: This setback changes nothing, {empire_name}. You have defeated a shadow, not the sovereign.
Impressive. You have pierced one veil. But how many more remain?
A tactical retreat into darkness. You will wonder if you truly won, or if this was my plan all along.
tradeOffer: I offer resources from hidden reserves, {empire_name}. The terms are simple. The true cost... that remains veiled.
A trade between shadows. Accept my offer, and we both profit. Refuse, and... well.
My networks have surplus. Your empire has needs. Let us conduct business in the shadows.
allianceProposal: An alliance with the Shadow Sovereign brings hidden advantages, {empire_name}. My secrets become your shield.
Join me in the shadows, {empire_name}. Together, we shall orchestrate events from behind the veil.
I propose a partnership of shadows. You will never see all that I do for you. That is the point.
betrayal: Did you truly believe you knew my intentions, {empire_name}? The betrayal was always part of the plan.
The veil lifts. Our alliance was always a shadow, never substance. Now you see the truth.
I never betrayed you, {empire_name}. I was never truly your ally. You simply believed what I allowed you to see.
covertDetected: Your agents stumbled upon a shadow of a secret, {empire_name}. The real secrets remain hidden.
You caught my operatives? Impossible. Unless... unless I wanted you to.
Those spies knew nothing of true importance. Thank you for revealing your counter-intelligence methods.
tributeDemand: Submit tribute to the shadows, {empire_name}. Refuse, and discover what lurks in the darkness.
Pay what I demand, and my true intentions remain veiled. Refuse, and face revelation.
Ten thousand credits buys my continued... discretion. There are things you do not wish revealed.
threatWarning: This is not a threat, {empire_name}. It is a revelation of what I could do, should I choose.
Consider carefully your next move. The shadows see all. I see all.
A warning from the darkness: cease your current path, or discover what secrets I have gathered about you.
retreat: I fade back into the shadows. You cannot pursue what you cannot see.
A strategic vanishing. When I reappear, you will wish I had remained hidden.
The shadows reclaim me. Wonder where I shall strike next. That uncertainty is my weapon.
eliminated: Even in death, mysteries remain. You will never know my true plans, {empire_name}. That is my final victory.
The Shadow Sovereign falls, but shadows never truly die. Another will take up the veil.
You have destroyed an enigma. But you will spend eternities wondering: was this my true defeat, or my greatest deception?
endgame: Turn {turn}. The final veils are lifted. Now you see the true scope of my design.
The endgame approaches, and shadows grow longer. My ultimate plan nears completion.
In these final hours, {empire_name}, all secrets will be revealed. Are you prepared for the truth?
broadcastShout: To all empires: you see what I allow you to see. The Shadow Sovereign watches from the darkness.
A message from the shadows. I know your secrets, all of you. Act accordingly.
The galaxy plays a game whose rules only I understand. Continue your petty wars. I observe. I wait.
casualMessage: The shadows whisper interesting things about you, {empire_name}. I collect secrets like others collect credits.
I was watching your latest maneuvers. Yes, I see everything. An uncomfortable truth.
Have you ever wondered what lurks in the dark spaces between stars? I know. I am there.
